Package eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.gtwrap.interfaces

Interface IIMultipleTankHandler

All Superinterfaces:
Iterable<IIFluidTank>
public interface IIMultipleTankHandler extends Iterable<IIFluidTank>
Used for interacting with multiple fluid tanks.
ZenClass:
mods.gregtech.fluids.IMultipleTankHandler

    • addFluids

      default boolean addFluids(boolean simulate, List<crafttweaker.api.liquid.ILiquidStack> fluidStacks)
      Simulates the insertion of fluid into a target fluid handler, then optionally performs the insertion.

      Simulating will not modify any of the input parameters. Insertion will either succeed completely, or fail without modifying anything. This method should be called with simulate true first, then simulate false, only if it returned true.

      Parameters:
      simulate - whether to simulate (true) or actually perform the insertion (false)
      fluidStacks - the items to insert into fluidHandler.
      Returns:
      true if the insertion succeeded, false otherwise.
